[00:00.00]Let Me - ZAYN (泽恩)
[00:01.13]Lyrics by：Zayn Malik/Khaled Rohaim/Michael Hannides/Anthony Hannides
[00:02.27]Composed by：Zayn Malik/Khaled Rohaim/Michael Hannides/Anthony Hannides
[00:03.41]Sweet baby our sex has meaning
[00:05.52]
[00:09.22]Know this time you'll stay 'til the morning
[00:11.51]
[00:14.75]Duvet days and vanilla ice cream
[00:16.79]
[00:19.69]More than just one night together exclusively
[00:22.44]
[00:25.61]Baby let me be your man
[00:27.50]
[00:31.14]So I can love you
[00:33.53]
[00:36.80]And if you let me be your man
[00:39.76]
[00:42.66]Then I'll take care of you you
[00:46.02]
[00:46.82]For the rest of my life for the rest of yours
[00:51.42]
[00:52.59]For the rest of my life for the rest of yours
[00:56.94]
[00:58.25]For the rest of ours
[00:59.95]
[01:00.55]We're drinking the finest label
[01:02.65]
[01:06.04]Dirty dancing on top of the table
[01:08.41]
[01:11.72]Long walks on the beach in April
[01:13.99]
[01:16.76]Yeah I promise darling that I'll be faithful
[01:19.88]
[01:22.53]Baby let me be your man let me be your man
[01:27.53]
[01:28.22]So I can love you I can love you
[01:32.76]
[01:33.84]And if you let me be your man let me be your man
[01:38.91]
[01:39.67]Then I'll take care of you I can love you
[01:44.21]For the rest of my life for the rest of yours
[01:48.36]
[01:49.52]For the rest of my life for the rest of yours
[01:53.90]
[01:55.31]For the rest of ours
[01:57.36]Give me your body and let me love you like I do
[02:01.70]
[02:02.93]Come a little closer and let me do those things to you
[02:07.42]
[02:08.55]This feeling will last forever baby that's the truth
[02:13.21]
[02:14.30]Let me be your man so I can love you
[02:18.43]
[02:19.47]Baby let me be your man let me be your man
[02:24.62]
[02:25.21]So I can love you I can love you
[02:29.73]
[02:30.83]And if you let me be your man let me be your man
[02:35.78]
[02:36.67]Then I'll take care of you I can love you
[02:41.18]For the rest of my life for the rest of yours
[02:43.60]For the rest of my life for the rest of yours
[02:46.76]For the rest of my life for the rest of yours
[02:49.18]For the rest of my life for the rest of yours
[02:52.43]For the rest of ours for the rest of ours

[ti:Let Me]
[ar:ZAYN]
[al:Let Me]
[by:]

[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.13]//
[00:02.27]//
[00:03.41]亲爱的宝贝 我们的缠绵蕴含深意
[00:05.52]
[00:09.22]我知道你将留下过夜
[00:11.51]
[00:14.75]偷个懒 品尝香草冰激凌
[00:16.79]
[00:19.69]我们之间并非只是一夜情而已
[00:22.44]
[00:25.61]宝贝 让我成为你的男人
[00:27.50]
[00:31.14]这样我便能悉心爱你
[00:33.53]
[00:36.80]若你答应我成为你的男人
[00:39.76]
[00:42.66]我会全心照顾你
[00:46.02]
[00:46.82]在我余生之中 在你余生之中
[00:51.42]
[00:52.59]在我余生之中 在你余生之中
[00:56.94]
[00:58.25]在你我余生之中
